title: [Health] Omega-3 supplements may help slow the effects of aging by suppressing damage & boosting protection at the cellular level during & after a stressful event. A study found the highest dose tested, 2.5 grams of omega-3s daily, was best at helping the body resist the damaging effects of stress.

[Health] Malaria is caused by the parasite Plasmodium which is transferred to humans by mosquitos. Research has begun to investigate the leaf extract Vernonia Amygdalina, which is as an effective anti-malarial medicine that is found predominantly in sub-Saharan Africa.
